title: Basic chemistry: family of halogens
brief_description: Shows the similarity and graduation of properties of the halogens and explains both the similarities and differences in degree on the basis of atomic structure. Looks at the properties of other families of elements in the Periodic Table. Suitable for upper secondary level.
